matchStrings:
kind: GitRepository
metadata:
  name: .*
  namespace: .*
spec:
  interval: .*
  ref:
    tag: (?<currentValue>.*)
  url: https://github.com/(?<depName>.*)

kind: OCIRepository
metadata:
  name: (?<depName>.*)
  namespace: .*
spec:
  interval: .*
  layerSelector:
    mediaType: .*
    operation: .*
  url: oci://ghcr.io/(?<packageName>.*)
  ref:
    tag: (?<currentValue>.*)
